p: The authors receive funding support for other unrelated research projects from the Australian Research Council (VB), Boehringer Ingelheim (VB), Morris Animal Foundation (VB, JB), Winn Feline Foundation (VB, JB) and partnership collaboration awards from the Universities of Sydney (VB, JB), University of Glasgow (VB) and University of California, Davis (JB). The senior author (VB) is a member of the Australian Infectious Diseases Advisory Panel (AIDAP), funded by Zoetis.
